front.title: Validation and long term verification data for Evidence Records and signed documents

abstract.t: Digitally signed documents and data in a LTANS service receive thesignature renwal procedures and non-repudiation services. Asdocuments can be stored for very long (theoretically inifinite)times, it is very important to understand which data is and will benecessary for the verification of the contained digital signaturesand the applied timestamps and the evidence records. This documentshall describe various pieces of information which SHOULD and MUST beprovided to effectively verify evidence records and their protecteddata and signatures.
